metadata.description: Ryuuichi is possibly the greatest magician in all the world. His tricks are spectacular and he is nearly impossible to hire. But it is not his bag of tricks that make him the greatest; it is his ability to solve mysteries. With flair and cunning he helps those in need, all while putting on an unforgettable show. Ryuuichi, the greatest detective magician there ever was!
metadata.name: Magician
